solution_line_template: She gave {pens_per_student} pens each to {num_students} students for a total of {pens_per_student}*{num_students} = <<{pens_per_student}*{num_students}={pens_given_to_students}>>{pens_given_to_students} pens

She left half of {remaining_pens} pens in her locker which is {remaining_pens}*({fraction_left_in_locker_numerator}/{fraction_left_in_locker_denominator}) = <<{remaining_pens}*({fraction_left_in_locker_numerator}/{fraction_left_in_locker_denominator})={pens_in_locker}>>{pens_in_locker} pens
